member.name: T:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapLayout
member.summary: The layout used when mapping a texture on an object in the 3D scene.

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapLayout.Stretched
member.summary: Stretches the texture along the X and Y axes until it fits the object. It does not preserve the original texture dimensions ratio (aspect).

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapLayout.Fitted
member.summary: Stretches the texture until its smaller dimension fits the object. This layout mode preserves the texture dimensions ratio (aspect).

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapLayout.Centered
member.summary: Similar to fitted. When used on the background object it also preserves the real original texture dimensions.

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapLayout.Tiled
member.summary: Repeats the texture along the X and Y axes. This layout mode preserves the texture dimensions ratio (aspect).

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapLayout.StretchedToWidth
member.summary: Stretches the texture by width until it fits. This layout mode preserves the texture dimensions ratio (aspect).

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapLayout.StretchedToHeight
member.summary: Stretches the texture by height until it fits. This layout mode preserves the texture dimensions ratio (aspect).

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapLayout.CropFitted
member.summary: Stretches the texture until its larger dimension fits the object. This layout mode preserves the texture dimensions ratio (aspect).

member.name: T:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapMode
member.summary: Defines how textures are mapped on the surfaces of an object.

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapMode.RelativeToObject
member.summary: Mapping is relative to the object. A mapping layout can be specified.

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapMode.RelativeToViewer
member.summary: Mapping is relative to the viewer.

member.name: F:Nevron.Nov.GraphicsGL.ENMapMode.Sphere
member.summary: Environmental mapping used for special visual effects like reflection.
